body.name: YELLAMI Handheld Game Console, Retro Game Console with 400 Classic FC Games 3.0 Inch Screen 1020mAh Rechargeable Battery Portable Game Console Support TV Connection & 2 Players for Kids Adults（Blue）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 22 hrs 26 mins
$9.99 scheduled pickup Today 2 PM - 6 PM. Order within 4 hrs 56 mins
features: 🎮【Built-in 400 Super Classic Games】This retro game console uses a simple arcade style. The classic FC game allows you to play 400 games without any advertising or additional costs. Every game is classic in your childhood. Bring back your memory

🎮【1020mAh Rechargeable battery】Built-in 1020mAh large capacity lithium battery can be charged, which supports up to 5-6 hours game playing time after being fully charged. You can play it outside without plugging in. So you don’t need to worry about running out of power outside, More comfortable gaming experience

🎮【Support for 2 Players &Supports TV connection】You can connect retro handheld game console with 3.0-inch screen to the TV, through safe and non-toxic ABS plastic game handle and 118 inch AV data cable, so you can easily enjoy lively and exciting video games on the TV's big screen. Note: The game signal can only be selected between the game console and the TV! Enjoy Your family entertainment time

🎮【Portable and Easy To Carry】 Compact and lightweight with slim body, you can put it in your pocket or bag, and carry it with you on the way to work, free time, the best choice for relaxing yourselves. Play anytime and anywhere, enjoy the fun of train, airplane, camp, or travel

🎮【Perfect Gift for Kids & Adults】The retro handheld game console not only bringing funny game time to children but also waking up wonderful childhood memories to the 80s and 90s adults, as well as releasing their life pressure. It is the perfect gift choice for Birthday Christmas and New year festival moments. If you have any problems during use, please feel free to contact us

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgrade Built-in 400 classic games: Arcade retro games, Logic & math, Sports, Puzzle, Arcade, Shooting, Action, Racing, Fighting games, Strategy, Adventure, Card games and more to meet your demand to play varieties of games what you like.

Product Introduction High-resolution screen：It features a colorful LCD screen and supports AV output, not only giving you a high-quality picture and gaming experience, but also making you more stress-free and make you feel better. Meanwhile, you could bring it everywhere with slim design.The game console is lightweight and portable, which makes it ideal to be taken on long trips. The game console also has a working time of about 4 to 6 hours. It can also be stored easily as it is small in size.

What you will receive! You can receive our products game console, game console battery, video cable, charging cable, manual, external game controller in addition, we also equipped with a game storage bag, to enable you to better store our products when not in use. Allowing you to carry easily and have a fun time anytime, anywhere.Great Gift: Elegant and stylish design, the is a gift that can create happiness and memories for game lovers.It can be used as a birthday gift, Christmas gift for Friends, Children.

Connect to TV There is a AV output cable and lovely gamepad so that you can connect the game consoles to TV and then enjoy the lively on the big screen. More importantly, it can also exercise children's thinking and logical ability. In the game clearance success, it also can bring the children full of confidence. Charge using a 5V1A charger Since the battery of our products is relatively small so please be careful not to use a high-powered charging head when charging, slight heating is normal when charging, please do not approach heat-conducting objects when charging. We hope our products can bring you a good experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice and Works just Fine
reviews.reviewText: I have a 3 year old son, and I bought him this as a Christmas gift. He absolutely loves it! It comes with another handle for 2 players, this was so much fun, I used to play Super Mario as a kid and it is really nice for my son to be able to have the same game! It works perfectly fine, the handle works as well. It has multiple games actually and it also has 2 languages for setting one of them is English the other is Chinese. I am satisfied overall with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money!
reviews.reviewText: This is a cheap hand held toy, the controller doesn’t work at all, I have returned one thinking it was a defect one and got a replacement with the same issues, it doesn’t work well either.Over all a waste of money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Grandson seems to enjoy this little game system. Would be great if it was a little sturdier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Son loves it
reviews.reviewText: Best Christmas gift ever. The fact he can hook it up to the TV and play with his brother and it was super affordable! I'm buying others as gifts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Remote doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: Can not get the remote controller to work when connected to the television 😔 game its self is alright for being so cheap though. But if you're wanting to hook it up to your TV to play. I do not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DISAPPOINTED, Save your money.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. 1. The bubbles remained after trying to remove the screen protector.2. Never would turn on. I'm trying to charge the battery. Because the unit won't turn on at all.3. The unit is not made of high quality materials.Please save your money, save some money and order one with better ratings. This really a piece of crap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like playing back in the day!
reviews.reviewText: Not only do you get a bang for your buck, but you really get to live your childhood again! It definitely takes you down memory lane! You’ll want to play for hours and hours! Turn it on, select your language, and choose your game!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The screen is very small and also came all bubbled up that won’t come out. Also I don’t like how you have to always pick the language every time you go to play a new game. It’s either English or Chinese.
